backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing scam reports, allowing submission, querying by user, and computing statistics including most common scam type.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature–to–file mapping documenting implemented app features, associated components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise descriptions for all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark themes, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and registers all routes wrapped inside the shared AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with navigation, main content area, and footer including a Caffeine attribution link.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop links and mobile sheet menu highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/Branding.tsx: Provides reusable logo and wordmark components using the generated DarkPattern Shield branding asset.
frontend/src/components/ReportsDashboard: Fetches and displays scam-report statistics with loading, error, and formatted dashboard UI states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities. Wraps AuthClient creation, login flow, and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching stats and submitting reports via an actor. Invalidates stats after successful report submission.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout. Applies global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/lib/riskDetector.ts: Analyzes text for high‑ and medium‑risk keywords to classify subscription‑trap risk levels. Returns severity, message, and detected keywords.
frontend/src/lib/riskQuiz.ts: Provides quiz questions, scoring logic, and risk level evaluation based on user answers. Calculates a normalized score and returns results with explanation and tips.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserExtensionConce: Displays a conceptual mockup page describing a future browser extension with detection steps and a warning popup preview.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, CTAs, and examples of common dark patterns. Highlights tools for detecting and reporting subscription scams.
frontend/src/pages/PersonalDigitalRiskTe: Implements a quiz-based digital risk test with scoring, explanations, personalized tips, and a retake flow.
frontend/src/pages/ScamReportingPage.tsx: Provides a scam report form with category selection, optional screenshot description, success/error handling, and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionTrapDetec: Lets users paste offer text and analyzes subscription-trap risk using keyword-based detection, showing level, icons, and explanations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, architecture notes, and image requirements for the DarkPattern Shield app.
